page.title: 18EDUCATION SCHOOL NOISES.
page.content: Noises in Strike Lane School. Here are the noises we hear in Strike Lane, The wind is blowing at the window pane. Music and Movement in the hall, Children's chatter and a teacher's call. The heating system makes a constant whirr, The brand new computer goes with a purr. The crinkling of a wrapper from a "Chew In the field we hear Mr.Carter's cows "Moo". The planes make the most noise flying over classes, The sound is incredible then follow kerosene gases, They drown all other noises from here to BAe, Then silence returns as they fly o'er the sea.
